lines.text: Once upon a time, there was a little girl named "Rachel." Actually, she wasn't all that little. She was a hot-looking high school senior with deep blue eyes, and fine, firm breasts and...
That's not the way Mommy tells it!
Shut up, that's the way I tell it.
when you lay down with dogs, you get up with puppies!
Hi, my name is Goldi. Actually, it's Golda. I was born during the Six-Day War.
Isn't she sweet, Papa? She'll be like the daughter we never had.
And you'll be like the parents I brutally slaughtered!
You go away! I got a meat cleaver here, and I know how to use it!
